amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Agriculture to submit a report on conservation programs administered by the Natural Resources Conservation Service relating to ocelots.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3493 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3493 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Cornyn to Amendment SA 3399. (consideration: CR S5499-5503; text: CR S5500) To require the Secretary of Agriculture to submit a report on conservation programs administered by the Natural Resources Conservation Service relating to ocelots.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3493 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Cornyn to Amendment SA 3399.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3493 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
